item.description:
Note: Please check this page frequently for updates and always remember to refresh the page.
Date Lesson Slides Reading Lab HW Project WEEK 1 Tue, Aug 27 Introduction to course PART I: MULTIPLE LINEAR REGRESSION Thur, Aug 29 Introduction to multiple linear regression WEEK 2 Tue, Sept 3 Model assessment, diagnostics and validation.

item.title: Policies
item.description: Prerequisites Students are expected to know all topics covered in the MIDS summer course review and boot camp. These include basic probability (including conditional probability, expectations and common probability distributions), and statistical inference (including hypothesis testing, confidence intervals, linear regression with one predictor, and exploratory data analysis). Students are also expected to be familiar with R/Rstudio. Due to space constraints, the course is open only to students in the MIDS program.
